company_location_locations: [{"continent": "Africa", "country": "Ghana", "state": "West Legon", "city": "Accra", "street": "Westlands Boulevard", "raw_address": "Westlands Boulevard, Accra, West Legon, Ghana, Africa", "position": {"lng": -1.0800271, "lat": 8.030028}}]
company_summary_description:
We are revolutionising business in Ghana and improving the way service is conducted and given throughout Ghana. SearchLocal allows you to see businesses based on location for example a painter in Osu, you‚Äôll then be able to see all painters in this geographic based on review score. The platform allows you to interact with genuine tradespeople / businesses. We have been collecting data not present on Google or online for years, my teams have been in the streets conducting the research and interviewing people one by one. 

Our mission is to connect the industry to the consumer no matter where they are in Accra first and foremost. Having access to reliable and accountable tradespeople at a competitive price in a swift manner. This will greatly put women and the underrepresented on the map!

Furthermore there are challenges facing tradespeople and artisans - Minimal budget, No digital presence, Relying on Word of mouth, lack of digital reviews on their services which our platform seeks to mitigate. In doing so minimizing exposure to rogue tradespeople. 

Platform Features
-Submit jobs locally for artisans to bid on. For example paint my house in Osu.
-Search for artisans by location , category and review score.
-Bid on jobs listed on the platform
-Payment System exists for customer to pay artisan via SearchLocal for complete peace of mind.
-Analytics and Insights - Tools for tracking performance and customer engagement
-Algorithms to match posted jobs to tradespeople and artisans
-Comprehensive Profiles: Detailed profiles with reviews and ratings.
-10,000s of Data items that has been collected over the years. Covering the job disciplines mentioned earlier in point 1.

The APP and Website are in the final stages and we will be launching the platform very soon. Do stand by ü´°

Any further questions or enquiries , please reach Jason Adjalo on 0551863389

FX", "title": "Account Manager", "employment_type": "Full-time", "location": "London, England, United Kingdom", "date": {"start": "2021-03-01", "end": "2022-03-31"}}]}, {"company": {"id": "c857cd4e-4baa-bb4c-0c6b-60c2626a684f", "name": "CWC", "logo": "https://s3.ai-ark.com/ark-company/images/c857cd4e-4baa-bb4c-0c6b-60c2626a684f.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Date=20251208T171707Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Credential=HC2GZVQFT79BXWGX0GP2%2F20251208%2Fai-ark%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=62e0a92d879787a96f9a5c2154e6c967bb7613cc196fd02561ca1561bc2af819", "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/cwc-group_258758", "employees": {"start": 51, "end": 200}}, "date": {"start": "2008-07-01", "end": "2020-12-31"}, "profile_positions": [{"company": "CWC", "description": "Managing a portfolio of Oil, Gas, Power, Water and Environment projects spanning Africa, Middle East and South America. My biggest projects included the Tanzania Oil and Gas Summit, Kuwait Oil and Gas Conference & Exhibition and the Arab Industries Conference and Exhibition which will be held in Jeddah in KSA.

The Tanzania Oil and Gas Summit is in collaboration with Ministry of Energy, TPDC and the Government and supported by PURA, EWURA, NEEC & TPSF. It also has the presence of majors such as Shell, Equinor, Dodsal, Total, Pan African Energy and Songas.

The Kuwait Oil and Gas Conference and Exhibition will be held on the 6th to the 8th of October in 2020. It is led by the Industry via the specially set up Steering Committee which consists of K-Companies, Ministry, Government and key Industry players. Led by Hashem Sayed Hashem, Deputy Chairman & CEO OF Kuwait Petroleum Company and Waleed Al-Bader the CEO of KNPC. Players include Shell, Schlumberger, Total, GOFSCO, Weatherford, Dow, Equate, Petrofac, Fluor, ABB et al.

Another project is the Ghana Oil, Gas & Power Summit held annually in Accra next edition likely to be 2021. This Involves liaising with Government figures, various Ministries, International & NOCs, Indigenous organisations, service companies and other industry stakeholders in putting together Ghana's biggest Energy platform.

Other projects have included :-

Saudi Water and Electricity Forum 2016 in Riyadh, KSA.
Intergas, Oil, Gas and Petrochemicals event in November 2015 in Cairo, Egypt.
Saudi Water and Power Forum 2013 in Jeddah
Africa Energy Week series in Cape Town and Accra.
Renewable World South Africa
Ghana Oil, Gas and Power Summit series
Middle East Oil and Gas Logistics in Dubai.
8th World LNG Summit in Barcelona
The American Gas Operations conference in association with the AGA in America
2009 Nigeria Infrastructure Exhibition in Abuja.
Nigeria Oil and Gas series.

company_summary_description: Poetics is a startup that develops AI related to language and speech communication, with the theme of "creating 21st-century poetics through humanities and science." It does so by crossing over insights from humanities (especially philosophy and literary studies) and various sciences. Since June 2022, the company has started offering its sales analysis AI, "JamRoll" (https://jamroll.poetics-ai.com/), and has been experiencing accelerated growth with an average monthly sales growth rate of 27.5%. So far, it has won over 10 international pitch contests such as Tech in Asia Singapore and ICTSpring, and has been selected as the first cohort of Google Launchpad Accelerator Japan. Additionally, it has been chosen for the "J-Startup" program led by the Ministry of Economy, Trade, and Industry.
company_summary_overview: Empath Inc. develops Emotion AI Empath, which can identify emotion from the voice in real-time regardless of language. Empath won 1776 Challenge Cup Tokyo 2017 and Accenture Innovation Award at GITEX 2017 in Dubai.

company_summary_description: FacilityOS is a global leader in facility, asset, and visitor management. The company‚Äôs modular platform is used by security professionals, facility managers, compliance teams, logistics managers, and operational leadership to optimize and automate key facility processes, achieve regulatory compliance, enforce safety protocols, and drive site security requirements. Their end-to-end platform is comprised of interoperable modules for visitor management (VisitorOS), emergency and evacuation management (EmergencyOS), contractor compliance management (ContractorOS), asset and logistics management (LogisticsOS), and physical visitor and contractor access control (SecurityOS).
company_summary_overview: The global leader in facility and visitor management for complex enterprises.¬†Deployed across more than 6,000 sites worldwide, iLobby powers complex work environments by optimizing and automating key facility processes to achieve regulatory compliance, enforce safety protocols, and drive site security requirements.¬†The iLobby platform is supported by robust reporting, turnkey onboarding, and extensive configurability that ensures maximum impact in complex and regulated industries.
company_summary_seo: iLobby is the global leader in visitor management. Optimize key facility processes for compliance, safety, & security. Trusted by 1000+ global enterprises.

awards: [{"title": "Presidential Award for Academic Excellence", "description": "The President's Award for Educational Excellence, established in 1983, is a distinguished recognition jointly conferred by the President of the United States and the U.S. Secretary of Education. This accolade honors graduating students at the elementary, middle, and high school levels who have demonstrated outstanding academic achievement and a steadfast commitment to educational excellence. Eligibility criteria include maintaining a minimum Grade Point Average (GPA) of 3.5 on a 4.0 scale, equivalent to an A- average or 90 on a 100-point scale. Additionally, students must fulfill at least one of the following: achieve high scores in reading or mathematics on state or nationally normed standardized tests, or obtain recommendations from a teacher and one additional staff member, highlighting the student's academic excellence and dedication to learning. The selection process is overseen by school principals, who exercise discretion in determining recipients based on the established criteria and the school's grading standards. Recipients are presented with a certificate bearing a gold seal, signed by both the President and the U.S. Secretary of Education. This award serves not only as a testament to a student's academic prowess but also as an inspiration for continued dedication to learning and personal growth.", "issuer": "President's Education Awards Program", "date": "2025-05-01"}]

projects:
[{"title": "MetastaScan AI - A Safer, Novel End-to-End Deep Learning(DL) System for Automated Circulating Tumor Cell(CTC) Detection and Analysis", "description": "Metastasis is responsible for 90% of cancer-related deaths as of 2025. It occurs when a tumor releases millions of circulating tumor cells (CTCs) and other biomarkers into the bloodstream and lymphatic system. CTCs are highly evasive, often escaping immune surveillance and therapy via protein regulation and clonal selection. After finding a dormant spot in blood flow, they extravasate, penetrate tissue, and attach to new organs. At these sites, CTCs disrupt nearby cells and collaborate with metastasis drivers to form new tumors.

The deadliness of metastasis stems from the lack of efficient CTC detection. Current methods rely on costly, slow processes like enumeration, staining, and manual review. MetastaScan AI addresses this challenge through a two-part AI system built for oncopathologists. The first component is a convolutional neural network (CNN) for segmenting CTCs in liquid biopsy whole slide imaging (WSI). I designed a novel architecture called W17NET_v2, inspired by U-Net, incorporating attention gates, skip connections, and atrous convolutions. Trained on 120,000+ images from a Caltech dataset, the model achieved 98.7% accuracy.

Next, key CTC features are extracted and sent to MetastaScan AI’s second part: the prognosis module. This subsystem merges patient demographic, genetic, and tumor data with CTC features to predict both a metastasis risk score and likely metastasis sites. The risk model uses a random forest classifier (97.3% accuracy), while the site prediction uses an artificial neural network (92.7% accuracy).

MetastaScan AI outputs the segmented image, CTC features, risk score, and predicted site, offering non-invasive, near-instant reports. This tool transforms cancer care by enabling early, proactive intervention—empowering clinicians and saving lives.", "date": {"start": "2025-01-01", "end": "2025-05-31"}, "contributors": [{"profile_id": "aravd", "type": "StandardizedContributor", "first_name": "Arav", "last_name": "Dharnikota", "sub_title": "Freshman @ BISV, Building @ Stealth", "headline": "Freshman @ BISV, Building @ Stealth", "profile_picture": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4E03AQGqJxQP48C1zw/profile-displayphoto-crop_800_800/B4EZnPnVitGUAI-/0/1760124820322?e=1762387200&v=beta&t=uAG07f00BV2mw3-SFMoAl1n4i2jk4k9FKUUSE1TiNy4"}]}, {"title": "InterActs App – Intelligent LLM Conversational Agents Emulating Iconic Historical Figures", "description": "InterActs is a cross-platform conversational AI system designed to simulate historically accurate dialogue with prominent figures through large language models (LLMs). Initially built to model early apostolic characters such as Paul and Peter, InterActs now scales to a broader range of intellectual and cultural figures. Each persona is constructed using prompt engineering, LoRA-based fine-tuning, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), enabling accurate emulation of linguistic style, worldview, and knowledge constraints.

The backend leverages OpenAI’s GPT-4 and open-source LLaMA models alongside Firebase Firestore, Python async logic, and message threading pipelines. A key feature is its iOS frontend, built in Swift, which provides users with a clean, real-time interface to interact with these historical AI personas. Messages are sent from the Swift app to Firestore, where a listener triggers response generation on the Python backend. Once the AI completes its output, the response is streamed back to the user through the mobile UI, mimicking a live conversation.

The app is optimized for educational and experiential use: students can interact with Socrates or Da Vinci, while museum visitors can explore curated personalities in historical context. Guardrails enforce strict temporal boundaries, prevent hallucinated claims, and ensure ideological neutrality. All output is transparently marked as AI-generated.

By merging frontier NLP technologies with native mobile interaction, InterActs transforms static history into responsive dialogue—redefining how we engage with the past in real-time.", "date": {"start": "2024-08-01", "end": "2024-12-31"}, "contributors": [{"profile_id": "aravd", "type": "StandardizedContributor", "first_name": "Arav", "last_name": "Dharnikota", "sub_title": "Freshman @ BISV, Building @ Stealth", "headline": "Freshman @ BISV, Building @ Stealth", "profile_picture": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4E03AQGqJxQP48C1zw/profile-displayphoto-crop_800_800/B4EZnPnVitGUAI-/0/1760124820322?e=1762387200&v=beta&t=uAG07f00BV2mw3-SFMoAl1n4i2jk4k9FKUUSE1TiNy4"}]}]

company_summary_description: Life‚Äôs not about a job, it‚Äôs about purpose. We believe real change starts with conversation. Here, your voice matters. Come as you are and together we‚Äôll do what‚Äôs right (not what‚Äôs easy) to serve the public conversation.
company_summary_overview:
X, formerly Twitter, is a global social networking platform that allows its users to send and read 280-character messages. It enables registered users to read and post their tweets through the web, short message service (SMS), and mobile applications. As a global real-time communications platform, X has more than 400 million monthly visitors and 255 million monthly active users around the world. X‚Äôs active group of registered members includes World leaders, major athletes, star performers, news organizations, and entertainment outlets. It is currently available in more than 35 languages. 

X was launched in 2006 by Jack Dorsey, Evan Williams, Biz Stone, and Noah Glass. X is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA, with local offices in Atlanta, Austin, Boston, Boulder, Chicago, Detroit, Los Angeles, New York, Sunnyvale, and Washington. 

X's international offices are located in Amsterdam, Berlin, Dublin, London, Madrid, Paris, Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo, Singapore, Sydney, Seoul, Tokyo, Toronto, and Vancouver.

company_summary_description:
Greyhound Marketing & Technology Services (GMATS) offers complete web development, social media, digital and offline marketing services. Our offline services include full service digital printing and telemarketing offered out the Gold Coast in Australia. Our proprietary developed services are RaffleFlex, GreyhoundMail and Greyhound Maps. 

Raffleflex is a raffle and lottery service that can be used by charities and other organisations aiming to fund-raise through such an option. 

GreyhoundMail is an email marketing platform that offers ease of use and high delivery rates of email marketing messages.

Greyhound Maps supercharges marketing efforts by integrating custom maps for each customer to a specific venue in email or print media. There are options to specify driving or walking distance in maps. These are perfect for charities, pubs, clubs, schools and real estate marketing.

projects: [{"title": "SPARSH Community", "description": "Sparsh was initiated as part of the TGELF Youth Leader Contest and has grown into a student-driven community dedicated to supporting the elderly. company_summary_description:
Bluesquare technologies promote smarter allocation of resources in emerging economies - so they get to where it matters most. 

Bluesquare systems and tools boost the reach, quality and efficiency of public services around the world and give users access to key performance data. They allow users to easily collect, manage, structure, visualize and share data. And create a link between financing and results, by transforming traditional aid into data-driven systems - encouraging better stewardship, accountability and transparency of programs. Bluesquare creates value from data and helps people make better decisions.

Working with governments, NGOs and donors, Bluesquare‚Äôs products currently impact over 60 million people in more than 18 countries worldwide. 

Follow us @blsqhub.
company_summary_overview:
Bluesquare provides delivering innovative technology for better lives.

We envision a world where everyone has equal access to quality public services. Something we see as essential for happy and healthy living everywhere.

Our technologies promote smarter allocation of resources in emerging economies ‚Äì so they get to where it matters most. BlueSquare systems and tools boost the reach, quality and efficiency of public services around the world and give users access to key performance data. They allow users to easily collect, manage, structure, visualize and share data. And create a link between financing and results, by transforming traditional aid into data-driven systems ‚Äì encouraging better stewardship, accountability and transparency of programs. BlueSquare creates value from data and helps people make better decisions.

Working with governments, NGOs and donors, BlueSquare‚Äôs products currently impact over 100 million people in more than 18 countries worldwide.

profile_summary:
Passionate about health financing and universal health coverage, BlueSquare was created to not only help countries build reliable and efficient data systems in health and financing, but to also support the allocation of resources. 

Prior to launching BlueSquare, Nicolas was deep in health financing reform and Results-Based Financing (RBF), already working on implementation in several countries, including Burundi, Benin, the DRC, Vietnam, India and Haiti. In addition, Nicolas is also Co-founder of the RBF Community of Practice, Founder of OpenRBF, and the happy father of three children.

company_summary_description:
PAiMo ÊãçÁõü is a social platform designed for badminton lovers to create clubs, host events, and connect with other players.
Our system includes smart matchmaking and a battle score rating that updates after every game ‚Äî making every point count. Whether you're hosting a casual session or a competitive ladder tournament, PAiMo helps manage participants, generate fair match draws, and track performance over time.

Built by passionate players, for passionate players ‚Äî PAiMo brings the badminton community closer, one rally at a time.

Where badminton players unite. Because every point counts.

profile_summary: rohansontakke [at] berkeley [dot] edu
projects: [{"title": "Using the Monte Carlo Simulation to Forecast Stock Prices in Python", "description": "The Monte Carlo simulation is a mathematical technique that generates random variables for modeling risk and uncertainty by building models of possible results. The simulation is used to model randomness, where a variable is known to be unpredictable. Because previous values are known, using randomness within a reasonable range is a commonly used method of forecasting stock prices.\nThis simulation was made in Python, using Pandas, NumPy, Seaborn, and Matplotlib.", "date": {"start": "2022-06-01", "end": "2022-06-01"}, "contributors": [{"profile_id": "rohan-sontakke-rss", "type": "StandardizedContributor", "first_name": "Rohan", "last_name": "Sontakke", "sub_title": "AI Researcher at Berkeley", "headline": "AI Researcher at Berkeley", "profile_picture": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5603AQFY8QiZimTUeg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1707890368498?e=1750896000&v=beta&t=AVUUGzzTqQMtCkRWRo7X68LT41H-1fTz5FQiO-vh5Ow"}]}]

company_summary_description:
At Mountain Dev, we transform innovative ideas into world-class software solutions, tailored specifically for tech startups aiming to make a significant impact. Located in the picturesque High Country of North Carolina, we serve a global clientele, providing them not just with software, but with a partnership designed to foster success from the ground up.

What Sets Us Apart?

Direct Access to Experts: Our clients work directly with our in-house team of lead engineers, designers, and product experts, ensuring clear communication and swift execution.

Entrepreneurial Spirit: Led by pioneers in both technology and business, our team doesn't just build software; we help sculpt your startup's future. As seasoned entrepreneurs as well as angel investors, we bring a deep understanding of what drives business success to each project.

Affordable Innovation: We specialize in turning early-stage ideas into prototypes ready to attract investment. We streamline the development process to build high-quality, investment-ready products without the heavy price tag.

Our Services Include:

Full Cycle Product Development: From ideation through to launch and scale.

Expertise in AI, Blockchain/Web3, UX/UI Design, and more.

Rescue Missions for existing products needing expert intervention.

Mountain Dev is more than just a software development firm; we are your gateway to turning great ideas into great software. Our mission is to empower startups with the tools they need to succeed, making us the ideal partner for anyone looking to make a positive impact through technology.

Connect with us to discover how we can bring your vision to life, ensuring your journey from startup to standout is both successful and seamless.

profile_summary:
As CEO and founder of Mountain Dev, I lead a dedicated team of engineers, designers, and product experts in transforming visionary tech ideas into successful software solutions. Based in the scenic Blue Ridge Mountains of North Carolina, we guide startups and entrepreneurs through the crucial early stages of development.

At Mountain Dev, our core offerings include mobile and web app development, product roadmapping, MVP creation, strategic IT partnership, and AI/machine learning implementation. 

What sets us apart is our unique blend of technical expertise and entrepreneurial insight gained from extensive experience in both software development and business strategy.

Our streamlined process ensures high-quality, cost-effective solutions that resonate with investors and users alike. We've proudly helped numerous clients secure funding and scale operations across various industries, from environmental intelligence platforms to regional weather hubs.

With a proven track record of successful projects and investment wins, Mountain Dev mitigates risks before allocating development funds, ensuring a smooth journey from idea to market. We're passionate about pushing the boundaries of innovation while guiding our clients toward sustainable growth.

Located in Boone, NC, our robust studio operates at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and the natural beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains. We're in this business because we love software, and we absolutely love helping people build great things.

Let's collaborate and bring your vision to life! Reach out to explore how Mountain Dev can be your trusted partner in technological transformation.
projects:
[{"title": "Rays Weather", "description": "Ray's Weather partnered with Mountain Dev to modernize their two-decade-old website, enhancing its functionality and user experience. We transformed RaysWeather.com by overhauling the outdated code and implementing advanced mapping and webcam features.

Challenges & Approach:
Initially, the site suffered from antiquated code and limited capabilities. Our revamp focused on:

Website Modernization: Transitioning to a modern, responsive design.
Advanced Mapping: Enabling dynamic interaction with weather maps for searching, filtering, zooming, and roaming.
Webcam Integration: Adding live streaming and timelapse features, along with a personalized Favorites list for users.
Technological Enhancements:
The project incorporated modern technologies to ensure robustness, scalability, and an improved user experience:

Backend Improvements: Optimization for better performance and reliability.
Frontend Enhancements: Using modern frameworks to enhance responsiveness and interactivity.
Client Testimonial:
Ray Russell, CEO of Ray's Weather, expressed his satisfaction with our transformation, noting it advanced their technology by two decades.

Impact & Results:
The update significantly improved user experience, allowing real-time interaction with weather data and increased personalization through subscriber accounts. This has boosted user engagement and retention.

Conclusion:
Our work with Ray's Weather underscores Mountain Dev's expertise in upgrading legacy systems into sophisticated, user-friendly platforms. We're committed to delivering innovative solutions that enhance our clients' success and user satisfaction.

Over several years, we've provided extensive development services and strategic consulting.

Initial Challenges:
HiveTracks' initial app suffered from a confusing UI/UX, unstable operations, and poor performance, with an average rating of 2.3 stars.

Complete App Overhaul:
We completely rebuilt the app using a tech stack that includes Python, Node.js, TypeScript, React, React Native, MySQL, PostgreSQL, AWS, Google Cloud Platform, and MS Azure. The app's rating soared to 4.8 stars. We also introduced HiveTracks Pro with features supporting large apiary management, including complex organizational structures, integrated data management, and QR codes for honey jars linked to a blockchain honey verification program.

Web3 Integration:
We launched HoneyTrail on the Hedera Network with the Facing Bees Foundation to tackle honey adulteration, providing a transparent traceability system.

Continuous Partnership:
Our ongoing support includes technical updates, strategic consulting, and participation in funding rounds.

Achievements and Impact:
HiveTracks now boasts over 5,000 users in more than 300 countries, with improved app ratings and innovative features like blockchain-based honey certification.

Future Directions:
We plan to leverage HiveTracks for biodiversity monitoring to enter the biodiversity credits marketplace.

Our partnership exemplifies our dedication to turning visionary tech ideas into successful software solutions, enhancing user satisfaction and positioning HiveTracks as an industry leader. company_summary_description:
MyJobBox transforms the way businesses and candidates connect. 

Finally, more focus on people and less on the process. 
The cross-platform portal enhances the performance of recruitment teams:
Top talent is activated smarter and faster, automatic updates and streamlined candidate communication ensure efficiency, and GDPR compliance is kept continuously up-to-date, ensuring the right audience is reached. 

Cherry on the cake: no restrictions due to the AI Act, allowing businesses to effortlessly leverage the latest technologies and elevate their recruitment process to the next level.

company_summary_description: At ProVenture, we specialize in delivering custom B2B software solutions that streamline operations and accelerate business growth. Our services include web and mobile app development, product design, and tech talent sourcing. We combine innovation with deep technical expertise to provide cutting-edge solutions tailored to your business needs. company_summary_description: Alucio‚Ñ¢ is working to transform scientific exchange in life sciences. Through the creative use of technology, we aim to help our customers introduce new medical therapies that result in better patient outcomes and improve lives.
company_summary_overview:
Alucio is a software startup that transforms scientific exchange and treatment access for the life sciences industry. The content management and engagement platform are designed for field medical professionals in life science. Beacon, its flagship product, improves scientific communication between MSLs, field-based medical professionals, and key industry stakeholders. The platform is optimized to enhance the medical and scientific dialogue between field medical professionals and critical industry stakeholders. It also offers easy document uploading, configuration, and distribution to help you manage your scientific library across local and global needs.

Alucio was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.
company_summary_seo:
Empowering field medical professionals in life science with the content activation and hybrid engagement platform built for them.

Beacon, flagship product developed by Alucio, is a cloud-based SaaS platform designed for Medical Affairs and Market Access to help enhance scientific exchange effectiveness.  

Beacon is a best-in-class & superior CLM that provides measurable content activation and impactful hybrid engagement.

company_summary_description: Caseware is the leading global provider of cloud-enabled audit, financial reporting and data analytics solutions for accounting firms, corporations and government regulators. Caseware‚Äôs innovative tools and platforms help more than half a million customers in 130 countries work smarter, dig deeper and see further as they transform insights into impact.
company_summary_overview:
CaseWare helps accounting firms, governments and corporations manage audit and financial reporting processes efficiently and with less risk.

Founded in Toronto in 1988, CaseWare International Inc. is a global software provider for accountants and auditors. Our solutions continue to push the technological boundaries in the industry by combining the power of automation with secure collaborative tools to help our customers reach new levels of productivity ‚Äì and make better business decisions. CaseWare solutions are trusted by over 400,000 users in 130 countries and in 16 languages.

profile_summary:
I have finished the Academy of Economic Studies in Bucharest with the degree in marketing.
I used to work as a personal trainer and this provided me the opportunity to understand how to work with customers, understand their needs and create a unique experience. 
While I was in the Work and Travel program I've experienced working with different cultures and I got a glimpse into what multicultural diversity actually means.
Now I am currently part of DB SCHENKER as General Ledger Senior Accountant.
I am continuously searching to improve my skills and I am always opened to learning.
I am keen on working in C# and learn more about programming.

company_summary_description:
Astrotalk was started by a nonbeliever who thought astrology was fake. However, when an astrologer correctly predicted everything about his life, he was shocked & started researching Astrology.

The founder of Astrotalk learned from his research that Astrology is real but 90% of the astrologers are fake.

In 2017, he decided to launch Astrotalk in order to connect customers with real astrologers.

Today, Astrotalk is one of the fastest-growing bootstrapped startups & is the largest company in the field of Astrology.

Astrotalk has served more than 3 crore customers, & it guarantees customer satisfaction!
company_summary_overview:
AstroTalk is a platform to consult best Astrologers of India online, on-call, or through chat.

The company was founded in 2017 and based in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India.
company_summary_seo: Astrotalk is the best astrology website for online astrology predictions from the best astrologers of India. Our astrologer can get answers to all your worries.

company_summary_description:
Saga has been specifically developed for legal professionals by experts with years of experience in the legal tech sector. The platform integrates the most advanced AI models, fully tailored to the needs of legal and tax practice.

Saga goes beyond generic solutions by providing concrete legal context based on legal research, case-related documents, and specific legal roles that we design and draft together with the lawyer or tax advisor.

What truly sets Saga apart is its lawyer-centric approach. Legal professionals not only have access to specialized legal tools, but also receive comprehensive training to maximize the benefits of these tools. Saga offers a proven adoption program, consisting of five interactive training sessions focused on awareness, process thinking, and practical application.

profile_summary:
NeueCode drives innovation in intelligent technology under collaborative leadership, creating secure and scalable AI solutions that align with client goals. With over six months as CEO, the focus has been on fostering a culture of excellence and delivering real-world value across industries. The team emphasizes integrity and continuous learning to stay at the forefront of AI advancements.  

Previous experience as Senior IT Consultant shaped expertise in SaaS, R&D, and strategic partnerships. These roles honed a customer-centric approach and the ability to address complex challenges, leveraging machine learning and AI development to empower organizations and drive impact.

company_summary_description:
Building and marketing health tech products that make a difference shouldn't be a struggle.

In this dynamic industry, it's easy to get lost in the noise. The Product Clinic Podcast brings together innovative health tech product leaders including product managers and product marketers, to share lessons learnt on the journey to delivering impactful solutions to market.

Join us as we navigate the complexities of this space to transform healthtech, one insightful conversation at a time.

Interested in being a guest on the podcast or have a topic you‚Äôd like to hear us explore? Contact us by messaging us here or on productclinicpodcast@gmail.com. 

We can‚Äôt wait to hear from you.

profile_summary:
DeepDrishti.ai is focused on pioneering advancements in artificial intelligence, leveraging expertise in distributed systems, big data pipelines, and NoSQL databases to deliver transformative solutions. With over a decade of leadership in engineering and innovation, the organization is committed to building scalable, efficient, and impactful technologies.  

Previously, contributed to the growth of Fanatics India Tech Center by fostering a high-performing team of data scientists and engineers to create cutting-edge e-commerce platforms. Driven by a passion for mentoring talent and engineering excellence, the team's collaborative efforts have consistently delivered innovative results in data-driven systems and platform services.

profile_summary:
Building Vertical SaaS for Sports Businesses.

I view myself as a doer in Tech, thinker in Product and hunter in Growth. Have wide experience in building Technology Solutions impacting industries like Ed-Tech, E-commerce, Finance, News Media, etc. Extensive experience in Building / Turning around products and scaling them exponentially. Successfully built and managed young teams in multiple companies ground up.

Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu. Used to head the Mobile division. Prior to this, was heading Technology at Zaggle. Earlier, was working on my own startup (Bucker) which I started while I was in his 3rd year of college.

Dropout IIIT Hyderabad - Computer Science major in Search and Information Retrieval with AI
projects:
[{"title": "Bidding Portal for IIIT-Hyderabad", "description": "Under my SSAD course I was assigned the project of setting up a Bidding Portal for IIIT-H where students can login and sell or buy items within the campus. The portal provides bidding facilities on an item so that the seller gets the best price possible. All the items on sale are listed and are effectively searchable. Buyers can even comment on that particular item and ask queries to the seller related to the item. All the items that get listed for selling are first verified by moderators who first approve the item for sale and then only it is visible for users to buy.
The portal uses CAS login and emails are sent to the seller whenever a new bid is made and to the buyer when his bid is confirmed.
The portal will be soon hosted for it to be used by the IIIT-H community.
Technologies : Ruby on Rails, Twitter Bootstrap and DataTables", "date": {"start": "2012-12-01", "end": "2012-12-31"}, "contributors": [{"profile_id": "rsk-fcone", "type": "StandardizedContributor", "first_name": "Ravneet", "last_name": "Singh", "sub_title": "Builder | 2x Founder | Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu | CTO @ Zaggle | GSoC & Microsoft | CS @ IIIT-H", "headline": "Builder | 2x Founder | Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu | CTO @ Zaggle | GSoC & Microsoft | CS @ IIIT-H", "profile_picture": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5603AQFwH_ug2wptrg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1700290826066?e=1762387200&v=beta&t=CyZ5AVEa8r9iQ2xbYy72pc_Wn4e1mb-Qimr5jhCsXYw"}]}, {"title": "Twitter + Stackoverflow Portal for IIIT-H", "description": "As a part of a competition in my college IIIT-Hyderabad under the OSDG (Open Source Development Group) I built a website that works on the flaws in both Twitter and Stackoverflow.Twitter doesn’t allows you to ask questions to the big guns you might be following and Stackoverflow doesn’t allows to follow those big guns who might be answering your questions.Therefore I developed ‘iQuest’ where in you can obtain both the functionalities. Follow people you think belong to your interest field and get your doubts resolved by them as well and of cource i won the Hackfest.
Technologies : Ruby on Rails, Rspec, Cucumber, Twitter Bootstrap, Bcrypt, Reputation-tagging", "date": {"start": "2012-09-01", "end": "2012-09-30"}, "contributors": [{"profile_id": "rsk-fcone", "type": "StandardizedContributor", "first_name": "Ravneet", "last_name": "Singh", "sub_title": "Builder | 2x Founder | Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu | CTO @ Zaggle | GSoC & Microsoft | CS @ IIIT-H", "headline": "Builder | 2x Founder | Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu | CTO @ Zaggle | GSoC & Microsoft | CS @ IIIT-H", "profile_picture": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5603AQFwH_ug2wptrg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1700290826066?e=1762387200&v=beta&t=CyZ5AVEa8r9iQ2xbYy72pc_Wn4e1mb-Qimr5jhCsXYw"}]}, {"title": "Twitter like Microposting Portal", "description": "Was feeling bored and had nothing to do so I started working on an App like Twitter to enhance my skills and get a better grip over Ruby on Rails. The complete development is TDD based which I know is a headache but is must for large projects.
Technologies : Ruby on Rails, Rspec, Cucumber and Twitter Bootstrap", "date": {"start": "2012-09-01", "end": "2012-09-30"}, "contributors": [{"profile_id": "rsk-fcone", "type": "StandardizedContributor", "first_name": "Ravneet", "last_name": "Singh", "sub_title": "Builder | 2x Founder | Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu | CTO @ Zaggle | GSoC & Microsoft | CS @ IIIT-H", "headline": "Builder | 2x Founder | Ex-Director of Technology @ Vedantu | CTO @ Zaggle | GSoC & Microsoft | CS @ IIIT-H", "profile_picture": "https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5603AQFwH_ug2wptrg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1700290826066?e=1762387200&v=beta&t=CyZ5AVEa8r9iQ2xbYy72pc_Wn4e1mb-Qimr5jhCsXYw"}]}]

company_summary_description:
Padel Society is a leading organization focused on growing Padel sports in Korea. 

We operate premium padel clubs, develop strategic partnerships, and enhance player experience through innovations like the Playus sports booking app. We also manage a thriving padel community and marketplace, connecting enthusiasts and promoting a healthy lifestyle.

company_summary_description: Agentic AI operating system to transform consultative sales motion, including actionable account insights, RFP response generation and targeted sales content
company_summary_overview:
Our Agentic AI Sales Operating System is purpose-built for enterprise consultative sales motion to streamline their sales processes and achieve better outcomes faster. With three powerful and seamlessly integrated modules, accountOS, knowledgeOS, and rfpOS, OrbitShift facilitates a full deal cycle. OrbitShift empowers sales/pre-sales teams to identify high-value accounts, get relevant account/people insights, generate highly contextual and personalized messages/emails, generate relevant content for conversations/presentations, and automate RFP/RFI responses. All in all, OrbitShift transforms how sales teams build pipelines, nurture leads/deals, and close deals. 

We deliver exceptional outcomes - 2-3X higher pipeline, 1.5-2X higher deal participation rate, 20-30% better win rates while generating unprecedented 60-70% efficiency benefits (e.g., account/people research effort, RFP response generation effort) through agentic workflow.
company_summary_seo: Accelerate pipeline creation and conversions through crisp actionable insights across every step of deal lifecycle

We redefine smart living by combining luxury, simplicity, and intelligence. Our AI-powered platform offers seamless control across all your devices, no matter the brand. We make technology work for you‚Äîbringing ease, sophistication, and innovation to your everyday living.

Our solutions are designed to elevate homes and commercial spaces with intuitive smart home integration and personalized automation. From personalized lighting scenes to energy-efficient climate control, we ensure every space functions beautifully and effortlessly.

Our Services:
1. Consultation & Installation Services: End-to-end guidance, from personalized planning to professional installation, ensuring seamless smart home setups.
2. Unified Control Platform: Manage all your smart devices from one intuitive app, regardless of brand or device type.
3. Guest Experience Solutions: Premium smart tech tailored for luxury rentals, hotels, and commercial spaces, enhancing guest comfort and convenience.

We make smart living feel luxurious, effortless, and accessible for every home.

profile_summary:
Wie w√ºrde sich Dein Alltag ver√§ndern, wenn du frei & unabh√§ngig dein Leben kreieren k√∂nntest, f√ºr dein Alter vorgesorgt w√§re & du dir wegen der Inflation keine Sorgen machen m√ºsstest?

Als Krypto Experte unterst√ºtze ich Menschen individuell Kryptow√§hrungen zu verstehen & sich so sicher zu f√ºhlen damit ihr freieres Leben aufzubauen, ohne technische und analytische F√§higkeiten besitzen zu m√ºssen.

Geht es dir auch so:
‚û°Ô∏è du sparst den Gro√üteil deines Geldes auf dem Bankkonto
‚û°Ô∏è wei√üt aber auch, dass das kein guter Weg ist & willst was ver√§ndern
‚û°Ô∏è du f√ºhlst dich vom Thema Kryptow√§hrungen √ºberfordert
‚û°Ô∏è willst ins Handeln kommen, wei√üt aber nicht richtig wie

So ging es mir auch vor √ºber 6 Jahren.

Dann hab ich von Bitcoin & Krypto als ein gutes Investment geh√∂rt. 

Allerdings war ich am Anfang auch erstmal skeptisch & √ºberfordert mit dem Thema, was mich aufgehalten hat zu investieren. 

Da ich den Wert hinter Krypto erkannt hatte bin ich aber dran geblieben & habe viel ausprobiert. Dabei habe ich einige Fehler gemacht & viel Geld verloren.

Durch tausende Stunden an Recherche & praktischer Erfahrung habe ich mir ein Verm√∂gen aufbauen k√∂nnen, was mir jetzt erm√∂glicht mein Leben so zu gestalten wie ich das will.

Genau dabei unterst√ºtze ich jetzt Andere. Damit sie es ohne gro√üen Zeitaufwand, Technikvorkenntnisse und teure Fehler es auch schaffen sich finanzielle Freiheit aufzubauen.

Wenn du daran Interesse hast, dann schreib mir einfach hier auf LinkedIn.

Wichtig:
Ich mache KEIN Network Marketing & w√ºrde das auch nicht im Krypto Bereich empfehlen.

company_summary_description:
Mylitchat: Stay Connected and Inspired

Mylitchat goes beyond just connecting you with friends and loved ones. It‚Äôs a comprehensive platform for sharing your life‚Äôs moments, staying updated on the world around you, and organizing your digital life. With Mylitchat, you can seamlessly share photos directly from your Android camera and manage them with personalized privacy settings for complete control.

Our app empowers you to stay current with the latest news, trends, and updates across the globe. Key desktop features are also available on mobile, enabling a consistent experience whether you‚Äôre writing on timelines, liking photos, discovering new people, or customizing your profile and groups.

Key Features

	‚Ä¢	Social Connections: Connect with friends and family, meet new people, and expand your social network.
	‚Ä¢	Express Yourself: Share your status updates with Mylitchat‚Äôs unique emojis to express what‚Äôs happening in your world.
	‚Ä¢	Media Sharing: Easily post photos, videos, and cherished memories to keep your loved ones close.
	‚Ä¢	Engagement Notifications: Get real-time alerts when friends like or comment on your posts.
	‚Ä¢	Local Events: Discover nearby events and plan meet-ups with friends.
	‚Ä¢	Follow What You Love: Stay updated with your favorite artists, companies, and websites.
	‚Ä¢	Local Business Lookup: Explore reviews, hours, and photos of local businesses.
	‚Ä¢	Marketplace: Buy and sell locally with the Mylitchat Marketplace, connecting with your community for convenient transactions.

With Mylitchat, you have a social network that‚Äôs as dynamic as you are connecting, sharing, and organizing your world with just a few taps.

company_summary_description:
Codoptix is a multinational AI and IOT company specializing in development of innovative and creative products and services that provide total communication and information solutions. Among a surfeit of services , tailor made applications, software development, software design, High-Tech Innovations,  E-commerce applications, Web Designing, Web Development Mobile Apps Development, Domain Registrations, Search Engine Optimization, Cyber Security, Web Service, Cloud service and Social Media Marketing and innovation operating primarily out of Armenia, with service offices in Europe and the Middle East, that seeks to provide a diverse set of fast-paced software development solutions domestically as well as to clients internationally.
The primary means of providing our services to potential customers revolves around understanding their unique software challenges and, through this vital information, assembling an ideal team of qualified personnel and specialists in the field of software development and engineering to provide reliable solutions to those challenges.
We seek out the most proficient programmers who exhibit fluency and sufficient understanding of the languages that are the most highly demanded in today's IT business environment such as Java, Python and C++. Through this, we aim to provide our clientele with the most robust long-term measures and solutions to ensure their continued productivity and competitiveness in the global IT market.

profile_summary:
I am the Founder of CODOPTIX LLC and a consultant specializing in security systems, RFID management, and custom software development. With over 15 years of experience, I deliver tailored, technology-driven solutions that enhance security and operational efficiency for critical infrastructures worldwide.

My expertise spans a wide range of sectors, including airports, borders, logistics hubs, smart facilities, and commercial projects. I work closely with clients to understand their unique challenges and design integrated systems combining advanced hardware and software technologies.

Core Competencies:

Advanced Security Systems: AI-driven CCTV, access control, perimeter protection, and fire alarm systems

RFID Management Solutions: Asset tracking, warehouse management, inventory control, and logistics monitoring

Custom Software Development: Bespoke applications built to meet project-specific needs, ensuring seamless integration and user-friendly operation

End-to-End Consulting: From risk assessment and system design to implementation, training, and ongoing support

By partnering with leading global technology providers, I ensure every project meets the highest standards of quality and reliability. My goal is to empower organizations to secure their assets and optimize operations through innovative and scalable technology solutions.

I welcome opportunities to collaborate with forward-thinking organizations worldwide looking for expert guidance in security , smart systems and RFID technology.

company_summary_description: At Xyonix, we teach machines how to read your content, see what is in your imagery, watch what is in your videos and understand what is in your data. With this enhanced ability, your custom built AI and machine learning models can give you insights and make high value predictions for you.
company_summary_overview:
Xyonix uses Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence to rapidly and repeatedly deliver insights and advantages from the data. It teaches machines how to read the content, see what is in the imagery, watch what is in the videos, and understand what is in the data. With this enhanced ability, its custom-built AI and ML models can give the insights and make high-value predictions.

Xyonix was established in 2016 and is headquartered in Seattle, Washington.
company_summary_seo:
Machine Learning and AI solutions made simple. We use cutting edge machine 
learning and artificial intelligence to rapidly and repeatedly deliver you 
insights and advantages from your data. Whether its NLP (natural language 
processing), computer vision, audio or structured data analysis, weve got 
you covered. A Seattle based data science consulting company.

{"title": "Method and system for extending keyword searching to syntactically and semantically annotated data", "issuer": "us", "description": "Methods and systems for extending keyword searching techniques to syntactically and semantically annotated data are provided. Example embodiments provide a Syntactic Query Engine (\"SQE\") that parses, indexes, and stores a data set as an enhanced document index with document terms as well as information pertaining to the grammatical roles of the terms and ontological and other semantic information. In one embodiment, the enhanced document index is a form of term-clause index, that indexes terms and syntactic and semantic annotations at the clause level. The enhanced document index permits the use of a traditional keyword search engine to process relationship queries as well as to process standard document level keyword searches. In one embodiment, the SQE comprises a Query Processor, a Data Set Preprocessor, a Keyword Search Engine, a Data Set Indexer, an Enhanced Natural Language Parser (\"ENLP\"), a data set repository, {"title": "Nlp-based entity recognition and disambiguation", "issuer": "us", "description": "Methods and systems for entity recognition and disambiguation using natural language processing techniques are provided. Example embodiments provide an entity recognition and disambiguation system (ERDS) and process that, based upon input of a text segment, automatically determines which entities are being referred to by the text using both natural language processing techniques and analysis of information gleaned from contextual data in the surrounding text. In at least some embodiments, supplemental or related information that can be used to assist in the recognition and/or disambiguation process can be retrieved from knowledge repositories such as an ontology knowledge base. In one embodiment, the ERDS comprises a linguistic analysis engine, a knowledge analysis engine, and a disambiguation engine that cooperate to identify candidate entities from a knowledge repository and determine which of the candidates best matches the one or more detected entities in a text segment using context information.", "date": null, "patent_number": null, "application_number": null, profile_summary: Carsten Tusk is an accomplished engineer and systems architect; he has extensive industry and research experience conceptualizing, architecting, and deploying advanced machine learning applications. His areas of expertise include content-based image retrieval, internet based search systems, distributed systems, software architecture and software development processes. His research interests and experience are information retrieval, machine learning, data mining and distributed systems.

company_summary_overview: Aleph Alpha transforms human-machine interactions. The company researches, develops, and operationalizes AI-based technology for the public and private sectors. Its generative AI solutions enable enterprises and governmental organizations to build intelligent products.

company_summary_description: Altana is the only Product Network connecting buyers, suppliers, logistics providers, and government agencies to drive resilience, compliance, and efficiency across the global supply chain. Customers like Boston Scientific, General Atomics, L.L.Bean, Maersk, US Customs and Border Protection, and the UK Ministry of Defense and Department of Business and Trade use Altana to design optimal product lines, protect national security, and promote economic growth through collaboration. To learn more, visit altana.ai
company_summary_overview: Altana is the only Product Network connecting buyers, suppliers, logistics providers, and government agencies to drive resilience, compliance, and efficiency across the global supply chain. By applying artificial intelligence to the world‚Äôs largest body of supply chain data, Altana reveals these previously opaque global networks and powers workflows across them. Customers like Boston Scientific, General Atomics, L.L.Bean, Maersk, US Customs and Border Protection, and the UK Ministry of Defence and Department of Business and Trade use Altana to design optimal product lines, protect national security, and promote economic growth through collaboration.
company_summary_seo: Altana AI enables trusted commerce by providing the single source of truth on the global supply chain.

profile_summary: Raphael Tehranian (‚ÄúRaph‚Äù)  is Co-Founder and COO of Altana Technologies, a company on a mission to fix globalization. Through Altana, organizations across the public and private sectors are building a more resilient, secure, inclusive, and sustainable globalization.  Prior to Altana, Raph built several clean technology, market intelligence, and supply chain businesses. Most recently, he built the enterprise business at Panjiva and co-led the successful sale to S&P Global. He draws on broad experience investing, advising, and operating across stages and markets including energy, agriculture, transportation, and financial services.

company_summary_overview:
Opal is the #1 Screen Time app. Join 200k+ people who use Opal to protect their time and focus. With a combination of app restrictions, real-time feedback, and rewards, you can begin to focus better and accomplish your dreams, just like Opal‚Äôs members.

Many of the world's top teams, startups, and Fortune 500 companies trust Opal's friendly assistant to help protect their time and focus. You can too.

 Opal‚Äôs mission is to help 1Bn people Focus better day to day, so they can accomplish their dreams.

company_summary_description:
In2IT Company
	In2IT Company is a leading event organizer technology company. We specialize in creating memorable event planning, high-quality production design, effective registration system, and implementing RFID technology to serve in MICE industry by the professionals. We have arranged many events on several levels from domestic to international scale contributing to both government and private sectors.
	
Services
	The success of our team is to make your desired event happen by applying the use of our technology to match your requirements. We can help design your dream event come true base on what you need with a little bit of advice from our experience. We offer a range of services, including event organizing, website and graphic design for your event, registration planning system, and production support.

company_summary_description:
Snix.ai is the fastest way to create stunning, on-brand fashion visuals ‚Äî no studio, no models, no delays.

Our AI platform generates hyper-realistic catalog, campaign, and try-on images in hours ‚Äî built for brands that launch 100+ styles a month. From D2C labels to marketplaces, we power product visuals that drive conversions and save weeks in production time.

Snix.ai helps brands scale content with consistency, speed, and creative control ‚Äî from studio-style photos to lifestyle looks, powered entirely by AI.

Fashion visuals, reimagined. Explore at snix.ai.

profile_summary:
I‚Äôm the Co-Founder of Snix.ai, where we help fashion brands, D2C labels, and marketplaces launch 100+ styles every month ‚Äî without sacrificing brand consistency, creative control, or market relevance.

At Snix.ai, we combine Generative AI, Data, and market-specific styling to transform garment images into high-quality, on-model visuals in 24‚Äì48 hours ‚Äî tailored for each region, ready for PDPs, campaigns, and marketplace rollouts.

With a background in AI research, and masters from IIT (BHU) Varanasi, I bridge creativity and technology to solve the biggest bottlenecks in fashion commerce: slow turnaround, high production costs, and the difficulty of maintaining a consistent brand voice across global markets.

Our work empowers CMOs and creative teams to go to market faster, localize effortlessly, and maintain complete creative oversight ‚Äî at scale.
